item.description:
One of our members, Nathan Briggs, has graciously offered to talk to us about his recent travels in Spain during which he visited several intentional communities and/or ecovillages. Please join us for this informal gathering (dessert only, no potluck supper!) to learn more about how some groups are implementing sustainable living practices and how it relates to permaculture.

If you can contribute a dessert, pls indicate in your RSVP. I'll have lots of good organic decaf and tea, etc.

Check back to confirm time, etc. in case it changes a bit closer to the date.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Special Meetup: European EcoVillages Slideshow & Discussion
